commandDescription: Compare source file against Salesforce and display differences. Can optionally add diff conflict markers on file to let the developer accept or reject changes manually using a git merge tool.
filesOrFoldersFlagDescription: List of files or folders to compare. Should be only Apex Classes, Apex Triggers, Aura Components, Lightning Web Components, or any unsplitted metadata.
noConflictMarkersDescription: If set to true, the command will not add diff conflict marker to each compared file.
outputFormatFlagDescription: [default: json]The format for the diff output, Possible values are json/csv.
